Posts.Content: This is a free support service for anyone getting chemotherapy which consists of cards and gifts thru the mail. Just go to the site Chemoangels.com to sign up. It is a wonderful volunteer organization, I have been an angel in this program for almost 10 years. They will assign you someone to support you.
Posts.Title: Chemoangel support while you get chemo-free

Posts.Content: Research your questions.  My husband has taken essiac tea for 2 1/2 years after surgery from colon cancer.  He also does flax oil and cottage cheese and Avemar plus many other supplements.
Posts.Title: essiactea and treatments..

Posts.Content: bAvemar costs between $120 per month and $200.00. I can be used complimentary to chemo. My hubby has been on it 2 1/2 years.  Very good for your immune system and overall well being also.  No real side effects.  He also takes IP-6, Essiac tea, flax oil and cottage cheese and various other supplements.
Posts.Title: Advice on Avemar - Natural Supplement?
Great song by Martina McBride on cancer

Posts.Content: http://catholiceducation.org/articles/euthanasia/eu0010.html My husband experienced this, food and water withheld for days until I signed for hospice and got him home.  Be educated on this please, I was not.
Posts.Title: Palliative care becoming euthanasia
